attributes.action: Reduce VAT on Energy/ Home fuel bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time for a reduction in VAT on Energy Bills, including Petrol at the pump.

The government has made a small fortune on the recent price rises, especially as they double Tax us by adding VAT on to tax hikes at the pump.
If the government really wants to stop the UK heading into a recession, then they have one lever they could pull, that lever is to lower VAT on Petrol at the pump pnmp and on Home Energy Bills.
